item.description:
Join Union Studio and William Raveis Real Estate for a brainstorming session about what YOU want to see next in residential housing design. In return for your opinion, we'll provide beer, wine, and hors d'oeuvres...and a raffle prize!

From preferences on community type and energy solutions to interior spaces and single & multi-family options, we'll ask your feedback on a variety of elements of residential design. And we promise not to try to sell you anything.

Please RSVP on the P-Collective page AND RSVP required to Emily@unionstudioarch.com. LIMITED SPACE AVAILABLE.

Wednesday, November 14th 5:30 - 8:30

Bravo Bistro - 2nd Floor Event Room

123 Empire Street, Providence, RI

* Complimentary beer, wine & hors d'oeuvres will be available throughout the event


EVENT PROGRAM:

6pm - Introduction:

What's Missing in Residential Real Estate Offerings? (Judy Croyle, William Raveis Real Estate)

New National Trends in Single-Family Housing & "Lighting Round" Visual Preference Survey (Douglas Kallfelz, Union Studio Architecture & Community Design)

6:30 - 20-Minute Round Table Discussions. Your choice of 2 of the following:

  • Round Table 1 - Facilitated by Kelly Taylor, Kelly Taylor Interior Design

Interior Design: What Works and What Doesn't?

  • Round Table 2 - Facilitated by Douglas Kallfelz, Union Studio, Your Neighborhood: What Do You Want from Your Community?
  • Round Table 3 - Facilitated by Joe Haskett, Union Studio

Sustainable Design: What Does "Green Living" Mean To You?

7:30 - Closing Remarks & Raffle Drawing

7:30 - 8:30 - Reception

* Complimentary beer, wine & hors d'oeuvres will be available throughout the event
item.how_to_find_us: Emily Bruce will be attending, please look at their pictures!
item.name: Seminar: Residence REDEFINED-With YOU in mind! PLEASE RSVP NOW - LIMITED SPOTS!
